reviews.review: Worth every penny, especially when on sale.
I finally got around to playing this and it's pretty alright gameplay wise. Plot is probably the single most overrated thing I've ever seen though.
J'adore l'ambiance du jeu et les dÃ©cors
NÃ¡dhernÃ© prostÅ™edÃ­, steampunkovÃ½ design zbranÃ­ atd. Hratelnost za mÄ› perfektnÃ­, moÅ¾nÃ¡ trochu jednoduÅ¡Å¡Ã­ i na vyÅ¡Å¡Ã­ obtÃ­Å¾nost, ale nenÃ­ to nudnÃ©.

Well Irrational Games did it again huh. Amazing game with another incredibly creative and fun concept. This time instead of being in the depths of Rapture, you're up in the clouds in the city of Columbia.

Great improvements to game-play with a great range of weaponry and salts. Still has that Bioshock feel but this in a completely different setting. The graphics are great for a 2013 game and still hold today in 2021. Elizabeth is a really well done sidekick and doesn't have that 'crappy AI' feeling, she's a complex character and it comes across in the game. (She also gives you moneyz)

Story's a great ride throughout, it's a real golden age gaming game that you've gotta play, and on any Steam sale its usually Â£4.99!! Insane!
Narrativa original; extensa. Altamente recomendable. GOD 50/10

La historia es atrapante y me dejo con mas misterios por resolver pero tiene su lÃ³gica, dentro de sus constantes y variables que van surgiendo.
Recomendo demais , mais vale a pena pegar na promoÃ§Ã£o

Wow, this game turned out to be far better than I expected. I have never played a single Bioshock game until this one, if you haven't either I recommend this one. Without spoiling the story, I really liked the artstyle and how this game managed to look good even after 7 years had gone by, and I enjoyed using my various "vigors" to slay my foes.

This was such a beautiful journey. For a 2013 game it still holds up fantastically well. Gunplay is smooth, fun, with a lot of weapons and super powers to vary your fighting style. The gun fights are explosive and will give you a good adrenaline rush.

Story is quite good. Of course it's known for its mind blowing ending, though I thought it had some pacing issues, because all revelations and twists are presented in the last 30 minutes, then the game suddenly ends. I felt it needed a little bit more time for the ending to stretch out and for you to think about it, instead of just throwing everything at your face just before the credits. However it was still a fun story to follow and I'm pretty sure back in the day forced everyone to google some explanation for the ending to understand everything.

Worth it on any sale of 10 dollars or less.

The gameplay is interesting, not a typical fps imo.
But where this game really shines is in the story telling. IMO this is one of the best stories i have experienced, definitely on par with something i could experience in a book.

the game is called Bioshock Infinite but the game doesn't feel like a bioshock game. if you want to play a bioshock game then don't buy this but if you want to play a non bioshock game then buy this game.

Para quem jÃ¡ jogou os outros 2 jogos da franquia, eu realmente indico esse game, eu achei que ele seguiu bastante a essÃªncia dos outros jogos BioShock, e principalmente, melhorou aonde os outros jogos deixaram a desejar. [h1][b]Points positifs (+)[/b] :[/h1]
âœ… [u]Histoire[/u] : Superbement Ã©crite ! On est tenu en haleine du dÃ©but Ã  la fin sans exagÃ©ration ! Un final monumental ! Woh !
âœ… [u]Immersion/gameplay/rÃ©alisme[/u] : Toujours aussi immersif ! Elizabeth est trÃ¨s bien intÃ©grÃ©e au joueur, on parle ici d'une vrai aide, pas d'un boulet que l'on se traine tout le long du jeu ! Les combats sont nettement plus nerveux !
âœ… [u]Graphismes[/u] : Columbia est superbe ! Le level design est dÃ©mentiel ! A ce niveau rien Ã  voir avec avec l'univers des deux premiers titres, c'est le total opposÃ© ! Beaucoup plus Ã©clairÃ©, moins sinistre ! 
âœ… [u]Doublage/sound design[/u] : La VF est trÃ¨s bien ! Le fait que Booker parle Ã©galement rajoute un vrai plus Ã  l'immersion ! Au top !
âœ… [u]Optimisation[/u] : RAS, parfaitement fluide du dÃ©but Ã  la fin !
âœ… [u]DurÃ©e de vie[/u] : Environ 17h pour terminer le jeu dÃ¨s la premiÃ¨re fois en mode 1999 en faisant la plupart des succÃ¨s (grÃ¢ce au code konami) ! 2h pour finaliser les quelques succÃ¨s restant en rechargeant quelques niveaux (saves manuelles) et chekcpoints ! âœ… [u]DLC[/u] : Le DLC "Tombeau Sous-Marin - 1ere partie et 2Ã¨me partie" est vraiment bien fichu ! La partie deux privilÃ©gie bien l'infiltration et la discretion ! Top !

i used to crack/piracy this game back in 2014 and play it on normal graphic setting on my potato PC but i don't understand anything about the story at all but the game play is fantastic and the open world kinda interesting to explorer. Now the game kinda cheaper on steam sale and i bought with DLC just to redeem my sin LoL and fully understand what is this game story about and get to play on ULTRA graphic Yeahhh .. Have a great day

WARNING: This does not feel like any other "Bioshock" game. That being said, I think the game is fun but it doesn't really feel like i'm playing a "Bioshock" title. This game is genuinely fun and i have a good time playing it but the gunplay can feel repetitive and it happens all the time. It's like i said, it's not like a "Bioshock" game. If they had named it something else, it would have made more sense. Or they could have made it a spinoff. Either way, i had a blast but proceed with caution if you're expecting the true "Bioshock" Experience
